intro: Habenaria praealta, commonly known as the tall lady's tresses, is an orchid native to the eastern United States. It is characterized by its tall, slender stems and dense, dark green foliage. The plant produces a long, spiraled inflorescence with small, white to pale pink flowers that bloom in late summer. It thrives in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and wetlands. Botanically, it is distinguished by its unique root system and specialized pollination mechanisms.
